= Introduction =

The 2nd version (current version  4.0.1v20120822 - version number according to the supported bugzilla version plus the build date) of the API has been released. This page is meant as a brief how-to set up this stuff.

= Details =

 # First of all download the binary distribution from the download section
 # Extract the content of the archive (the archive contains the jar with the binary files and a `lib` folder with the required third party libraries)
 # Place the LightningBug-API-jar and the required libraries into your classpath
 # Follow the samples below to connect to bugzilla and query product information or search for bugs
